00062 void MseMeasInfoX::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00063 {
00064    fprintf(f, "$rc['run_name']                       = \"%s\";\n", run_name.c_str()          );
00065    fprintf(f, "$rc['polarimeter_id']                 = %d;\n", (short) polarimeter_id    );
00066    fprintf(f, "$rc['start_time']                     = %d;\n", (int) time_t(start_time)        );
00067    fprintf(f, "$rc['stop_time']                      = %d;\n", (int) time_t(stop_time)         );
00068    fprintf(f, "$rc['beam_energy']                    = %f;\n", beam_energy       );
00069    fprintf(f, "$rc['nevents_total']                  = %d;\n", nevents_total     );
00070    fprintf(f, "$rc['nevents_processed']              = %d;\n", nevents_processed );
00071    fprintf(f, "$rc['polarization']                   = %f;\n", polarization      );
00072    fprintf(f, "$rc['polarization_error']             = %f;\n", polarization_error);
00073    fprintf(f, "$rc['phase']                          = %f;\n", phase             );
00074    fprintf(f, "$rc['phase_error']                    = %f;\n", phase_error       );
00075    fprintf(f, "$rc['profile_ratio']                  = %f;\n", profile_ratio     );
00076    fprintf(f, "$rc['profile_ratio_error']            = %f;\n", profile_ratio_error);
00077    fprintf(f, "$rc['target_orient']                  = \"%s\";\n", target_orient.c_str()     );
00078    fprintf(f, "$rc['target_id']                      = %d;\n", target_id         );
00079    fprintf(f, "$rc['asym_version']                   = \"%s\";\n", asym_version.c_str()      );
00080    fprintf(f, "$rc['alpha_calib_run_name']           = \"%s\";\n", string(alpha_calib_run_name).c_str());
00081    fprintf(f, "$rc['measurement_type']               = %d;\n", measurement_type  );
00082    fprintf(f, "$rc['disabled_channels']              = \"%s\";\n", disabled_channels.c_str() );
00083    fprintf(f, "$rc['disabled_bunches']               = \"%s\";\n", disabled_bunches.c_str()  );
00084    fprintf(f, "$rc['ana_start_time']                 = %d;\n", (int) time_t(ana_start_time)    );
00085    fprintf(f, "$rc['ana_duration']                   = %d;\n", ana_duration      );
00086    fprintf(f, "\n");
